description:
Feature: Send Money to a receiver
  In order to test the personal message scenarios
  As a teller of the application
  I want to test the send personal message feature

  Background: Login,InitiateCustomer
name: Send Money to a receiver

elements.description: Scenario: SendMoney with different Personal Message with DATA SendMoney_Success
elements.name: Scenario: SendMoney with different Personal Message with DATA SendMoney_Success

steps.name: Given I am on Customer Products Page
And sends personal message Hi, happy birthday to you.
And Fee in transaction summary shows the Net Fee
And Fee in Shopping cart applet shows Net Fee
And Fee in shopping cart checkout grid shows Net Fee
